price: Báyẹn ni ọ̀rọ̀ Olúwa rẹ ṣe wá sí ìmúṣẹ lórí àwọn tó ṣèbàjẹ́ pé dájúdájú wọn kò níí gbàgbọ́.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ فَسَقُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika ḥaqqat kalimatu rabbika ʿalā alladhīna fasaqū annahum lā yu'minūna
